article.headline: Holy Cross 58, Colgate 55
article.story: HAMILTON, NY (AP) -- Tim Clifford scored 18 points to lead Holy Cross in a 58-55 win over Colgate Tuesday. Keith Simmons scored 16 points and Torey Thomas added 11 for Holy Cross (15-6, 6-0 Patriot League). John Simon led Colgate (6-13, 1-5) with 22 points as the team lost its fifth consecutive game. A three by Simmons found the bottom of the net with 20 seconds left to give Holy Cross the lead following a time out. Holy Cross held on when Kyle Chones was partially blocked on his attempt to tie the contest. There were five lead changes and two ties in the final four minutes of the game. Simon tied the game at 55-all with less than a minute to play. A three by Simmons found the bottom of the net with 20 seconds left to give the Crusaders the win.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
